meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the meteoritical rock found in the crater.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of meteoritical fragments.
meanings.sent3: The children imagined a meteoritical race between shooting stars.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as meteoritical as a shooting star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the meteoritical event left a lasting impression on the town.

meanings.definition: Of or resembling a meteor in speed or brilliance.
meanings.sent1: The car moved at a meteoritical pace down the highway.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks lit up the sky with meteoritical bursts of color.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so meteoritical that the audience gasped in amazement.
meanings.sent4: His meteoritical talent on the dance floor dazzled everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's performance was meteoritical, leaving spectators in awe of his speed.
